abstract: New Zealand Breakers, former outsider team in Australia’s National Basketball League, have overcome rocky beginning by winning three of league's past four championships and have already secured playoff spot with 19-8 record entering their regular-season finale against Cairns Taipans (Series: Not the Knicks).
lead_paragraph: An outsider in Australia’s National Basketball League, the New Zealand Breakers overcame a shaky start and a no-frills existence by learning how to win.

headline.main: A Basketball Outlier With an Inside Track
headline.seo: With Kiwi Charm, the New Zealand Breakers Master Australia’s National Basketball League
headline.print_headline: A Basketball Outlier With an Inside Track
headline.kicker: Not the Knicks: New Zealand Breakers

snippet: An outsider in Australia’s National Basketball League, the New Zealand Breakers overcame a shaky start and a no-frills existence by learning how to win.
